title: Little Matchmakers
description: Three holiday stories follow the efforts of children seeking to complete their families with Danny's ad placement for a father, Patty's hopes for a merry Christmas, and orphan Frank's dreams of pairing up his housemom with a baseball star.- The Matchmakers, Debbie Macomber- Mrs. Scrooge, Barbara Bretton- A Carol Christmas, Muriel Jensen
author: Debbie Macomber
